subsection.name: Description
subsection.div: Checks that parameters for methods, constructors, catch and for-each blocks are final. Interface, abstract, and native methods are not checked: the final keyword does not make sense for interface, abstract, and native method parameters as there is no code that could modify the parameter.
subsection.p: Rationale: Changing the value of parameters during the execution of the method's algorithm can be confusing and should be avoided. A great way to let the Java compiler prevent this coding style is to declare parameters final.

tr.td:
subset of tokens
METHOD_DEF , CTOR_DEF , LITERAL_CATCH , FOR_EACH_CLAUSE .
